page.title: 05Education Norboro'CP School
page.content: Northborough School is very popular because of it's high standard of work, especially reading in the younger classes. This school only accepts children from the ages of 4 to 11. The children come from Northborough and by bus from Maxey, Deeping Gate and Deeping St. James. Northborough School is on of the smaller schools in Peterborough. It has 176 children and six and a half teachers. We do a great variety of work, often working as part of a group in a problem solving way. We have a four acre orchard with two bee hives and a pond which are often used by other schools. We have many other visitors, including groups of teachers and Education Officers who come to Northborough to look at the work of the school, especially our reading approach and the group work.
